meanings: [명사] awareness, realization, cognition, (formal) cognizance; (이해) understanding; (인정) recognition; (통찰) perception; (지식) knowledge [동사] (이해하다) understand, perceive, see; (깨닫다) realize; (사실로서) recognize; (알다) know
look at in the right light
realize the importance of the problem

vlive.korean: [황당] 저거를 인식해줘? [Feeling absurd] They recognize that? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.20

vlive.english: [TAEHYUN, show us what you got!] It recognizes...

vlive.korean: [안면 인식] - 호시 형 전화번호 공개해버려 - 호시... [Face identification] - Show his number. - Hoshi. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.9 불면제로 #2 (Insomnia-Zero #2)
내 거는 인식을 못 하나 봐 왜 나는 오케이만 뜨지? I think the machine can't recognize my move. Why am I only getting "ok"? 듣기 View video BTS : 진기민😄
vlive.english: I think the machine can't recognize my move. Why am I only getting "ok"?

examples.korean: The self is the only knowable existent. 발음듣기 자아만이 우리가 인식할 수 있는 존재이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The self is the only knowable existent. 발음
